channel.title: How to make a private sever on LAN?
channel.description: Ok so I don't have the computer power to run a professional private server and I'm not looking to be a good represented host I just want to make the server run on LAN so people on my router can load the server without having to connect to the internet to do so, any help is really appreciated, thanks! ;D

item.title: How to make a private sever on LAN?
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

I’m not too sure but if they connect by the localhost ip? Or your default gateway? Try that see if it works.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a private sever on LAN?
